Aden Vanguard Captain Adolph:
This ring I got from Orvana. He commanded me lend it to someone I deem enough able for the upcoming battles.
This is a beautiful ring that awakens hidden the ability of the owner. Once You put on it, and You will be able to use part of the huge forces that You have to get subsequently.
So if You're ready, try fully to end the constant influx of evil spirits.
